Item.Value: [Text:Ah! I was wondering when I'd hear from you. $Character_11$ told me you'd be arriving soon. I'm $Character_12$, the village blacksmith. Not what you were expecting from the mayor's wife I bet, am I? If you need anything hammered out, you come visit me at my forge, alright?]
[Text:Well, hello there! HOw's the day treatin' you $Name$?][Default]
[Text:If you find yourself running low on ore, I keep a stock of it myself. It'll cost you, of course, but I promise I'll give you the best deal I can!][Default]
[Text:What do you need today? {{Talk-Talk|Construct Buildings-BuyBuildings|Maintain Buildings-Maintenance|Never Mind-Cancel}}]
[Text:Weather like this makes my bones ache. I hope $Character_11$ has a bath running for me tonight.][Weather:Raining]

[Text:The best part of the winter for me is looking out at the falling snow from the heat of my forge. Sometimes, I go out and just run around to cool off. $Character_11$ says flopping down in the snow to make snow angels is undignified, but I've never let dignity stop me from having fun before!][Weather:Snowing]
